          <title>
            <string language="en">Increasing an object's gravitational potential energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhöhung der möglichen Gravitationsenergie 
einer Nachricht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Augmentation de l'énergie potentielle de la 
gravité d'un objet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aumentando a energia potencial gravitacional de 
um objeto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aumento dell'energia potenziale gravitazionale 
dell'oggetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αύξηση της βαρύτητας πιθανής ενέργειας ενός 
αντικειμένου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aumento de la energía potencial gravitacional de
un objeto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the gravitational potential energy of an object can be increased by lifting it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">height</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die mögliche 
Gravitationsenergie einer Nachricht durch das Anheben sie erhöht 
werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'énergie 
potentielle de la gravité d'un objet peut être augmentée en le 
soulevant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a energia potencial 
gravitacional de um objeto pode ser aumentada levantando o.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'energia 
potenziale gravitazionale di un oggetto può essere aumentata 
alzandolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η βαρύτητας πιθανή 
ενέργεια ενός αντικειμένου μπορεί να αυξηθεί με την ανύψωση της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la energía 
potencial gravitacional de un objeto puede ser aumentada 
levantándolo.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
